metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12121 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Node.js: All versions prior to Node.js 6.15.0, 8.14.0, 10.14.0 and 11.3.0:Denial of Service with large HTTP headers: By using a combination of manyrequests with maximum sized headers (almost 80 KB per connection), andcarefully timed completion of the headers, it is possible to cause the HTTPserver to abort from heap allocation failure. Attack potential is mitigatedby the use of a load balancer or other proxy layer.

criterions.comment: nodejs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
